                              DatasetService datasetService)
        Distribute instances according to the condition they satisfy.
        Parameters:
        instances - the instances to distribute
        conditions - the conditions on which to distribute the instances
        datasetService - the data service for these instances
        Returns:
        the distribution of the instances according to the given parameters
